title: Castle Clinton National Monument: Plan Your Visit
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit           Plan Your Visit         Castle Clinton NM.   Planning a trip to lower Manhattan? Castle Clinton National Monument is open 7 days a week 7:45AM until 5:00PM. The Castle is located at the southern end of Battery Park along the water's edge. Ranger guided tours are offered every day. The schedule is posted on the door of the Castle Clinton Exhibit. There is also a Junior Ranger program available.  Educational tours are available for school groups.  Visiting the Statue of Liberty? Please click here. . Basic Information Directions & Transportation Things to do Calendar Safety Acessibility
